title: Trump, Oprah and Gun Control
itunes:title: Trump, Oprah and Gun Control
description:
The Steve Harvey Morning Show crew discuss Trump, Oprah, Gun Control and LeBron James' clap back at Fox news anchor, Laura Ingraham.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
